name: v2.6.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at release-v2.6.x -->

## What's Changed
### Application Performance Monitoring (APM)
* feat(appsec): improved redirect handling of downstream requests by @RomainMuller in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4180
* feat(contrib/mcp/go-sdk): Add intent capture to `go-sdk` by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4209
* fix: update lambda integration tests with slack notifications and verâ€¦ by @joeyzhao2018 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4254
* feat: bump DataDog/go-libddwaf/v4 to v4.8.0 by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4284
* fix: lambda tests github action by @joeyzhao2018 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4291
* test(contrib/ibm/sarama): fix consumer group flaky test by @rarguelloF in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4295
* feat(contrib/mark3labs/mcp-go): Add mcp_method, mcp_tool, mcp_tool_kind tags to mcp server tracing by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4288
* feat(contrib/modelcontextprotocol/go-sdk): Add mcp_method, mcp_tool, mcp_tool_kind tags to mcp server tracing by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4289
* fix(serverless): Support returning errors with new line characters. by @purple4reina in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4316
* docs: update supported integrations documentation by @dd-octo-sts[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4237
* chore(ddtrace/tracer): Utilize dynamic lock checks for SpanContext by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4326
### General
* ci(contrib/haproxy): deploy to reliability at each releases by @e-n-0 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4232
* feat(telemetry): add OriginCalculated, and re-export Origin type in config by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4224
* fix(config): support 0/1 and case-insensitive boolean values in getBool by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4227
* feat(otel): adding support for OpenTelemetry metrics by @rachelyangdog in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4132
* chore: lint fixes by @quinna-h in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4242
* chore(config): migrate dataStreamsMonitoringEnabled by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4219
* ci(benchmarks): add haproxy spoa macro benchmarks by @e-n-0 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4246
* chore(config): migrate tracer.logStartup by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4214
* chore(config): migrate tracer.runtimeMetrics and tracer.runtimeMetricsV2 by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4215
* chore(config): migrate tracer.profilerHotspots by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4216
* fix: fix typo in code owners file by @cbeauchesne in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4251
* chore(config): migrate tracer.profilerEndpoints by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4217
* fix(civisibility): fixes git permissions and add more debug logs by @tonyredondo in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4252
* fix: upload to CI was not always accessing secrets by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4255
* chore(datastreams): add data-streams-monitoring to CODEOWNERS for DSM integrations by @robcarlan-datadog in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4244
* ci(contribs): fix tag extraction for docker images releases by @e-n-0 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4272
* fix(.github/workflows): revert #4098 by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4270
* chore(github): Do not render go.sum files by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4274
* feat(remoteconfig): add support to the RC client for unsubscribing from a product by @andreimatei in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4248
* chore: "eager" encoding for v1 protocol payloads by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4273
* chore: hold RLock when reading meta/metric maps by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4253
* fix(civisibility): fixes the missing logs due to the new partial logs in Go1.25 by @tonyredondo in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4283
* chore: Mark go.work.sum as generated by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4285
* feat(openfeature): add LRU cache for exposure deduplication by @leoromanovsky in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4290
* chore(ci): enable AWS OIDC authentication for Lambda integration tests by @ganeshkumarsv in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4277
* fix(instrumentation/testutils/containers): stop log producers on cleanup by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4296
* fix(civisibility): fix git test flakiness by improving resilience and skipping on some known errors by @tonyredondo in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4297
* fix(civisibility): fix cases where the git pack-objects fails due to a cross-device error by @tonyredondo in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4298
* fix(.github/workflows): rename FEATURE_FLAG_EXPOSURE `system-tests` scenario to FEATURE_FLAGGING_AND_EXPERIMENTATION by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4299
* chore(ci): Add GitHub Action linter and fix the issues by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4275
* chore(internal/locking): Add static and dynamic lock analysis package by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3834
* chore(codeowners): Make ml-observability owner of MCP contribs by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4287
* feat(internal/{appsec,traceprof}): reduce dependency on google.golang.org/grpc by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4183
* ci: update macrobenchmark, SLO check and SLO notification rules by @igoragoli in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4172
* chore(config): migrate logToStdout and isLambdaFunction by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4256
* feat(tracer): add support for dynamically enabling and disabling Live Debugger by @andreimatei in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4249
* chore(config): migrate globalSampleRate and introduce configProvider.getFloatWithValidator by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4257
* fix(internal/remoteconfig): properly close RC client by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4302
* fix(ddtrace/opentelemetry): fix ignored sampling decision from otel by @genesor in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4238
* fix(internal/telemetry): replace global variable with lazy initialization by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4307
* feat(internal/telemetry): app-endpoints telemetry playload by @RomainMuller in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4305
* chore(config): migrate first chunk tracer configs by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4258
* feat(config): Config Visibility - report telemetry about all config sources by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4308
* docs: add known build flags to reduce size of instrumented binaries (& scout rule) by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4311
* feat(.github/workflows): use `registry.datadoghq.com` to pull agent in CI by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4312
* chore: replace use of `runtime.SetFinalizer` with `runtime.AddCleanup` by @RomainMuller in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4315
* fix(internal/orchestrion): sort clean ups in mongo integration tests by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4319
* fix(telemetry): Make sure log tags are propagated correctly by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4324
* feat: new gotip workflow by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4314
* chore: revert "feat(.github/workflows): use `registry.datadoghq.com` to pull agent in CI (#4312) by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4329
* ci: pin k8s client-go by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4331
* ci: aggregate benchmark results from parallel pipelines by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4330
* ci: remove smoke test runs from PRs by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4332
* fix(.gitlab): disable macrobenchmarks on merge queue by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4334
* chore(internal/locking): Change the lock detection library by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4327

## New Contributors
* @robcarlan-datadog made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4244

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/compare/v2.5.0...v2.6.0
